@cryurchin wish I had a decade worth of thoughts to draw on! Make your brain into a V60 and condense that stuff into pure joy.
Clever word that I learnt today: "Demiurge"... working Definition: something that contemporary academics are definitely not.

@SamMiles87  well done!!

Sticking a bit of Ru Paul in a conference paper is allowed right? Can I get an Amen? #phd #phdchat #academic
Today is one of those twenty hour work days. My eyes burn. Tomorrow I'm going to drink beer and eat burgers. Academia: highs and lows.
RT @AcademicsSay: Yes, I've heard of work-life balance. I gave a workshop on it last week and am co-editing a related special issue to whic…
Just broke 21,000 words. What a week it has been. Now it's time to edit this beastie.
@princecolin good luck! once upon a time I actually made a half marathon. It's time to dig out the trainers once this chapter is done!
@princecolin I do love running. I mean I did once. I will run again promise. Planning on breaking a real 10K soon :)
Broke 10K feeling like a legend. 10K in words that is. My lazy legs haven't moved from my chair all day @AcademicsSay #phd #academic
Another inappropriate PhD chapter heading i'm going to have to edit: "The perfect setting for a liberal education (and a murder!)" *sigh*

RT @ThisTechGirl: .@PennyRed's review of #MadMaxFuryRoad is everything you want to start off your week with:

http://t.co/chqfillCy2 http:/…
@drsamgoodman It's going well thanks! Currently drafting a monster chapter on pop. culture and HE which is getting a bit out of hand...
Who needs a bank holiday? I just managed to get 90210 into my thesis on economics and education. Feeling epic. #phd #academiclife #winning
@drsamgoodman Really Well Done! This is great. You already look like an academic celebrity (and ARE!) in that photo. Congratulations to you!

"How Academic Novels Tell Stories about Higher Education (and Why We Might Care)" not sure I can leave this title in my chapter!  #academia
Referencing now perfect. Don't know if it makes me happy or want to cry #phd
@cryurchin woohoooooo #proud #winner meet up soon would be great - R and I are coming up to London early June - can't remember how ur fixed?
@Dissertating thanks for the vote of confidence. I agree that its best to throw it all out there and then spend time cleaning up the mess!
Highlight of the Day. Citing: "Confessions of a Pseudo-Victorianist, or How I Fell Ass-Backwards and Landed in a Period" in my thesis  #phd
Drafting a chapter after reading solidly for four months is like opening a can of Coke that's been in the washing machine.  #phd  #phdchat
@HEA_Events @hea_AH excellent news, I will keep a lookout for news :) Let me know if you need someone to help out, I'd be more than happy!
@cryurchin congratulations Matt! whatsthejob? Nice to hear hope and optimism in the midst of drafting the weirdest chapter of my thesis yet!

Waking up to a Conservative country is worse than waking up to a wine hangover. I'll be testing this thesis tonight. Results to follow.
